title: Transportation: Bus (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Bus subcategory within Transportation. Includes 7 card(s).

cards.romaji: Basu tei wa doko desu ka?

cards.english: Does this bus go to Narita?
cards.romaji: Kono basu wa Narita ni ikimasu ka.
cards.japanese: このバスは成田に行きますか。

cards.english: I'll get off at the next bus stop.
cards.romaji: Watashi wa, tsugi no basutei de orimasu.
cards.japanese: 私は、次のバス停で降ります。

cards.english: Where is the next bus stop?
cards.romaji: Tsugi no basutei wa doko desu ka?
cards.japanese: 次のバス停はどこですか？

cards.english: Is Narita Airport the next stop?
cards.romaji: Narita kuko wa tsugi desu ka?

cards.english: I'll get off at the next bus stop.
cards.romaji: Watashi wa, tsugi no basutei de orimasu.
cards.japanese: 私は、次のバス停で降ります。

cards.english: For long-distance journeys, all-day and all-night buses are also available.
cards.romaji: Ch.kyori ryok. ni wa, k.sokubasu mo arimasu.
cards.japanese: 長距離旅行には、高速バスもあります。
